name: sco_diabetes
title: Scottish Diabetes Survey Dataset
description: Scottish Diabetes Survey Dataset reflects many aspects of the quality of diabetes care across the whole of Scotland. The quality and the completeness of the data included within the Survey continues to improve. Most of the data contained in the Survey is extracted from the national award-winning diabetes IT system SCI-DC/SCI-DIABETES.

sources.name: NHS Scotland - Scottish Diabetes Survey Monitoring Group

contributors.name: Scott Cunningham, Ritchie McAlpine, Erwin Oosterhoorn, Colin Fischbacher, Andrew Gasiorowski, John McKnight, ... (see acknowledgements in PDF reports)

fields.name: ind_no
fields.description: Index number of measure being described.

fields.name: ind_name
fields.description: Index name of measure being described.

fields.name: number
fields.description: Number of patients attributed to measure

fields.name: measure
fields.description: Percentage of patients attributed to measure
